argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsummptcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsummptcl.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 3 |  | gsummptcl.n | |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) |
| 4 |  | gsummptcl.e | |- ( ph -> A. i e. N X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | gsummptfif1o.f | |- F = ( i e. N |-> X ) |
| 6 |  | gsummptfif1o.h | |- ( ph -> H : C -1-1-onto-> N ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 8 | 5 | #P_fmpt | |- ( A. i e. N X e. B <-> F : N --> B ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> F : N --> B ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` G ) e. _V |
| 11 | 10 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( 0g ` G ) e. _V ) |
| 12 | 9, 3, 11 | #P_fdmfifsupp | |- ( ph -> F finSupp ( 0g ` G ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 7, 2, 3, 9, 12, 6 | #P_gsumf1o | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( G gsum ( F o. H ) ) ) |
